title: Plate, 1760s–80s
markings: Signed "LO" monogram on rim of base.
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Circular form with scalloped edge; decorated with flowers and foliage, mythological Callot-esque figures. Green and ochre on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Plate, 1760s–80s. Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-4.
